name: Leftovers
instructions: Zap it, Fry it, Bake it, Cook it

name: Nothing
description: Ya done goofed and either ate lunch too late or you waited too late to eat cause you were playing video games. Either way, this means a big breakfast for tomorrow so you can think of that while you lie awake at night staring at the ceiling with a grumbling stomach.
instructions: wait

name: Takeout
instructions: Call restaurant and order.
Pick up food.
Come home and eat.

name: Pink Pasta
description: Delicious pasta that makes 6 individual meals
instructions: Start the frozen meatballs on a skillet with a tiny bit of avocado oil on low heat.
Start cooking both boxes of pasta according to the instructions.
Once pasta is done, drain, add a whole jar of alfredo, and a whole jar of marinara.
Add in extra seasonings like garlic powder and onion powder if you want. Probably some black pepper too.
Add in the meatballs once they are cooked.
Cover the pan and let it get hot all the way through. The heat and pressure will activate the delicious flavors.

name: Macaroni and Sausage
description: Velveeta mac and cheese with sliced up, pan cooked chicken sausage for additional protein.
instructions: Slice the chicken sausage into thin pieces and toss into a skillet with low heat. You can add a little oil if you want but it probably doesn't need it depending on the fat content.
Start cooking both boxes of pasta according to the instructions.
Once pasta is done, drain, add cheese sauces.
Add in extra seasonings like garlic powder and onion powder if you want. Probably some black pepper too. Cumin brings this dish to life.
Add in the sausage once they are hot.
Cover the pan and let it get hot all the way through. The heat and pressure will activate the delicious flavors.

name: Enchilada Beef
description: Saucy and tangy slow-cooked beef over rice or mac and cheese
cookTime: 5 hours for crock pot, 10 minutes for rice
instructions: Coat bottom of crock pot with some of Red Enchilada Sauce can.
Place beef on top of sauce. Cut and remove strings if it has it.
Pour rest of Red Enchilada sauce over top of beef, covering top and sides entirely.
Set crock pot to high and cook for 4 hours 30 minutes.
Put on top of rice and add a delicious amount of feta cheese

name: Tacos
description: Ground beef, rice, and beans mixed together in perfect harmony.
instructions: Start the rice cooking
Cook the ground beef until its brown.
Add in the taco seasoning and water.
Simmer for two or three minutes.
Add in the pinto beans and mix into ground beef.
Add in the rice and mix until everything is coated.
Add some extra onion and garlic powder.

name: Store Pizza
instructions: Cook it.

name: Pancakes
description: Delicious pancakes sometimes with chocolates and butter.
instructions: Mix up pancake mix per box and add chocolate chips.
Cook on medium heat with cooking spray.
Flip once bubbles start to form.
Top with butter.
